Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our premium product. We believe it would greatly benefit your endeavors and enhance your business significantly. Our initial offer for this exceptional item is $950000. We are confident in its value and believe it represents a fair and advantageous proposition for both parties. We look forward to discussing this further with you. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $950,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $950,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer and proceed to the next round, where you will send Alice a counteroffer 
(3) Buy the product from Jhon for $1,000,000
